segments.text: I want to take part in the bus tour . When does the bus leave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . I don't have much time to waste .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . The bus tour is really worth while . You can enjoy the whole city in a single day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long does the tour last ?
segments.speaker: S1
